2B25FBB4.3_instruction: Navigate to these map markers to find Tortured Gifts.

3D08DF31.0_instruction: Helltide periodically rises in areas of Sanctuary in Nightmare difficulty and above.

8C67E8B2.1_instruction: Collect {c_highlight}Aberrant Cinders{/c} and exchange them for Tortured Gifts, chests containing loot of a specific item slot.
